resources.string: Iwe unofanirwa kugamuchira mvumo yenzvimbo kuti Securitly ishande
Securitly inoda kuziva yako nzvimbo nguva dzese

Unoda kugonesa nzvimbo yako?
Enda kune Zvirongwa -> Zvishandiso -> Securitly -> Gara uchibvumira nzvimbo.

Wobva watangazve Securitly
Tumira meseji yechimbichimbi kana bhatiri rasvika
Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kuseta zvakare default data?
Unoda kudzima munhu uyu kubva pane ako mazita mazita?

1. Securitly inoda kuziva nzvimbo yako nguva dzose. Kuti uite izvozvo, enda kune zvigadziriso zvemudziyo wako -> mapurogiramu -> Securitly -> Mvumo uye shandura mvumo yenzvimbo kuti "Bvumira nguva dzese".
2.Usamanikidza kuvhara Securitly. Zvikasadaro, meseji yako yekukurumidzira haizotumirwa kune vako vaunosangana navo.
3. Hatikurudzire kuti uise chiyero chebhatiri kwaunotumira meseji yako yekukurumidzira ku1 kana 2%, sezvo mudziyo wako unogona kudzima usati watumira meseji.

Ichi chishandiso chakagadzirwa nevadzidzi vashanu kubva kuTechnological Institute yeLaguna, Mexico. Ichi chirongwa chakatanga sepfungwa yatakaronga kuita chokwadi, uye pamwe chete nemudzidzisi wedu, injiniya Gerardo, takaita kuti zviitike. Neiyi app tinotarisira kupa zvishoma nemamiriro ezvinhu munyika.

Nzvimbo yangu yekupedzisira yaive:
latitude:
40.776570
kureba: -73.969979
Central Park West Historic District
New York, 10024, EE. UU.
Securitly haigone kushanda nekuti "Tumira SMS" mvumo haina kupihwa

Securitly haigone kushanda nekuti "Nguva Yese Nzvimbo" mvumo haina kupihwa. Securitly inoda kuziva nzvimbo yako kuti ikwanise kutumira yako yekupedzisira inozivikanwa nzvimbo kune vawasarudza vaunosarudza
Paita dambudziko pakutora nzvimbo yemudziyo uyu yakakamurwa
Usaratidze "nzvimbo inodiwa" pop kumusoro kana Securitly yatanga
